Product List

Loading...

{{ product.name }} - {{ product.price | currency:product.currency }}

import { Component, OnInit, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from './product.service'; import { Product } from '../product.model'; import { CurrencyService } from '../currency.service'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { ExchangeRate } from '../exchange.model'; import { Country } from '../country.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) //implements OnInit export class ProductComponent implements OnInit{ products: Product[] = []; exchangeRates: ExchangeRate[] = []; countries: Country[] = []; currencies: string[] = ['USD', 'EUR', 'AUD']; selectedCurrency: string = 'USD'; /* constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string, private currencyService: CurrencyService) { http.get(baseUrl + 'products').subscribe(result => { this.products = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } */ constructor(private productService: ProductService) {} ngOnInit() { this.loadProducts(); } loadProducts() { this.productService.getProducts().subscribe(products => (this.products = products)); this.productService.getExchangeRates().subscribe(exchangeRates => (this.exchangeRates = exchangeRates)); this.productService.getCountries().subscribe(countries => (this.countries = countries)); } /* onCurrencyChange(currency: string) { this.selectedCurrency = currency; this.currencyService.setCurrency(currency); } convertPrice(price: number, targetCurrency: string): number { // Implement logic for currency conversion here // This is a placeholder and should be replaced with actual conversion logic return price; } */ changeCurrency(product: Product) { console.log(product.id); console.log(this.selectedCurrency); const currentDate = new Date(); console.log(this.exchangeRates); const exRate = this.exchangeRates.find( (rate) => rate.currencyCode === this.selectedCurrency && new Date(rate.validFromDate) <= currentDate && (rate.validToDate === null || new Date(rate.validToDate) >= currentDate) ); console.log('Exchange Rate Object:', exRate); const exchangeRate = exRate ? exRate.rate : 1; console.log('Final Exchange Rate:', exchangeRate); // const priceInSelectedCurrency = product * exchangeRate; // console.log('Price in Selected Currency:', priceInSelectedCurrency); // return priceInSelectedCurrency; this.productService.convertPrice(product.id, this.selectedCurrency, exchangeRate).subscribe(convertedProduct => { // Update the product list with the converted product const index = this.products.findIndex(p => p.id === convertedProduct.id); if (index !== -1) { this.products[index] = convertedProduct; } }); } }
